name: img-2
description: Replace elements with to automatically pre-cache images and improve page performance.

scripts.build: babel --plugins=transform-class-properties,transform-es2015-modules-strip src/img-2.js --out-file dist/img-2.js && babel --plugins=transform-class-properties --presets=es2015 src/img-2.js --out-file dist/img-2.es5.js

author: Leon Revill (@revillweb)
